sources.title: Creature from the Haunted Sea
sources.description: When a Carribean Island is engulfed by a revolution, one unscrupulous American mobster, Renzo Capeto plans to clean up with a get-rich-quick scheme. His diabolical plan is to provide refuge for the loyalists, and the contents of the government coffers, on his boat. He would then murder his passenger and escape with a fortune. Planning to blame their deaths on a mythical sea monster, no one is more surprised than Renzo, when the real monster appears with its own agenda.

sources.title: Creaturefromthehauntedsea
sources.description: A crook decides to bump off members of his inept crew and blame their deaths on a legendary sea creature. What he doesn't know is that the creature is real. You can find out more about this movie on its IMDB page .

sources.title: Creature from the Haunted Sea (1961) ROGER CORMANüçï NEW 4K RESTORATION
sources.description:
ORIGINAL DIRECTOR'S CUTüçïNEW 4K RESTORATION
It's Friday@PizzaFLIX 
Director: Roger Corman
Starring: Antony Carbone, Betsy Jones-Moreland, Robert Towne

The King of The Drive-In Strikes Again! Roger Corman takes on the Spy, Gangster, and Monster genres and folds them into a big fishy Cubano. Secret Agent XK150 is played by Edward Wain, aka Robert Towne, who became one of Hollywood‚Äôs greatest screenwriters, known for The Last Detail, Shampoo, and Chinatown.

THE PUERTO RICO TRILOGY: In 1960, Roger Corman set sail for Puerto Rico incentivized by the tax breaks for filming on the sunny island. Two films were scheduled back-to-back: Battle of Blood Island and The Last Woman on Earth. Filming went so smoothly that Corman commissioned Charles Griffith to write a third, which was shot at the same time: Creature from the Haunted Seaüçï

sources.title: Creature From The Haunted Sea (1961)
sources.description: Roger Corman directed this tongue-in-cheek story about a gang of crooks who try to swindle a trunk of money away from some Cuban Exiles. Part of their plan involves a fabricated story of a sea monster. Unfortunately the sea monster turns out to be real. You can find out more about Creature From The Haunted Sea at A Passion For Horror .

sources.title: Creature from the Haunted Sea (1961) Directed by Roger Corman + commentary + 4K
sources.description:
A group of anti-revolutionaries escapes Cuba with stolen treasure. Hunted by an undercover agent, they fake a sea monster attack to manipulate their crew. What follows is a satirical blend of betrayal, absurdity, and classic spy movie tropes.

With bonus audio commentary:  go to settings ‚öôÔ∏è and select the Audio Track "English Descriptive"

sources.title: Creature from the Haunted Sea (1961) Beware the monster lurking beneath the waves
sources.description:
WHAT WAS THE UNSPEAKABLE SECRET OF THE SEA OF LOST SHIPS?
A crook decides to bump off members of his inept crew and blame their deaths on a legendary sea creature. What he doesn't know is that the creature is real.

Director: Roger Corman
Writer: Charles B. Griffith 
Stars: Antony Carbone, Betsy Jones-Moreland, Robert Towne 
Genres: Colorized, Cult Film, Monster Movie, Comedy, Horror

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/N6h_AtrAMvE

00:00 Full length movie with subtitles
01:28 Narrator explains Cuba
02:02 Secret meeting in the tropics
10:00 Renzo devises a plan to scare the Cuban soldiers by creating a fake sea monster, but the scheme begins to unravel.
20:00 Sparks Moran, an undercover agent, struggles to maintain his cover while observing Renzo‚Äôs increasingly violent actions.
30:00 The group lands on a remote island, where tensions rise as they prepare to retrieve the sunken treasure.
40:00 The monster claims its first victim, leaving the group terrified and suspicious of each other‚Äôs motives.
50:00 Mary-Belle accuses Renzo of murder, leading to a dramatic confrontation that fractures the group‚Äôs unity.
1:00:00 The survivors face the monster in a final, desperate battle, uncovering the truth about its existence.

metadata.Plot: American crook Renzo Capetto sees a chance to make a bundle when a Caribbean island has a revolution. He plans to help loyalists (and the national treasury) escape on his boat, then kill the men and blame their deaths on a mythical sea monster. Trouble ensues when the _real_ monster shows up!
metadata.Actors: Antony Carbone, Betsy Jones-Moreland, Robert Towne
